sources.title: 1968 - One by One - Italian-Spanish spaghetti western - directed by Rafael Romero Marchent
sources.description:
Bill learns that his father, during the American Civil War, was accused of theft and killed. Teaming up with a former Mexican scout who was present and left for dead, they set out for revenge and to find the stolen money.

Original title: Uno a uno, sin piedad (1968)
Also known as: One by One; One Against One‚Ä¶ No Mercy

Director: Rafael Romero Marchent
Writers: Eduardo Manzanos, Odoardo Fiory, Marino Girolami

metadata.Plot: A cafe worker is violently jolted from her day-to-day existence when offered the startling revelation that this world may be on the brink of destruction, revolution, or both.
metadata.Writer: Diane Jessie Miller, Paul Spence, Katherine Webb
metadata.Actors: Heather Wilson, Sean Meyer, Steven Macaulay
